page.title: 17Recreation
page.content: Dyserth Badminton Club was started at Ysgol Hiraddug in 1984 where it meets on Wednesdays.The court is used by the pupils from 3.15pm to 4.15pm,then later by the Junior members 7-8pm followed by the adults until 10pm.Eighteen members pay a membership fee of 100p adults or 50p children plus 25p or 50p a game. Next to the school is the Bowling Club started in 1950.The green is 60yds by 40yds and illuminated by four powerful floodlights.Some of the 120 members compete in the local Bowling League.If it is raining the members can play snooker in the Clubhouse.Dyserth Soccer Club were started in 1950 and play in the Third Division of the Clwyd League on a pitch in Rhyl.This year they won the Dyserth Shield. Meliden Soccer Club use the public pitch by Ysgol Melyd.
